verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

If any one <S%H5315><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%>, and commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and deal falsely <S%H3584><s%> with his neighbor <S%H5997><s%> in a matter of deposit <S%H6487><s%>, or of bargain <S%H8667><s%>, or of robbery <S%H1498><s%>, or have oppressed <S%H6231><s%> his neighbor <S%H5997><s%>,

or have found <S%H4672><s%> that which was lost <S%H9><s%>, and deal falsely <S%H8267><s%> therein <S%H7650><s%>, and swear to a lie <S%H8267><s%>; in any <S%H259><s%> of all these things that a man <S%H120><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%>, sinning <S%H2398><s%> therein <S%H2007><s%>;

then it shall be <S%H2398><s%>, if he hath sinned, and is guilty <S%H816><s%>, that he shall restore <S%H7725><s%> that <S%H1500><s%> which he took by robbery <S%H1497><s%>, or the thing <S%H6233><s%> which he hath gotten <S%H6231><s%> by oppression <S%H6487><s%>, or the deposit which was committed <S%H6485><s%> to him <S%H9><s%>, or the lost thing which he found <S%H4672><s%>,

or any thing about which he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%>; he shall even restore <S%H7999><s%> it in full <S%H7218><s%>, and shall add <S%H3254><s%> the fifth part <S%H2549><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> thereto <S%H5414><s%>: unto him to whom it appertaineth shall he give it <S%H3117><s%>, in the day of his being found guilty <S%H819><s%>.

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> his trespass-offering <S%H817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> out of the flock <S%H6629><s%>, according to thy estimation <S%H6187><s%>, for a trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>, unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>:

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and he shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> concerning whatsoever <S%H259><s%> he doeth <S%H6213><s%> so as to be guilty thereby <S%H819><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>: the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> shall be on the hearth <S%H4169><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> all night <S%H3915><s%> unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and the fire <S%H784><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be kept burning thereon <S%H3344><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H3847><s%> on his linen <S%H906><s%> garment <S%H4055><s%>, and his linen <S%H906><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> shall he put <S%H3847><s%> upon his flesh <S%H1320><s%>; and he shall take up <S%H7311><s%> the ashes <S%H1880><s%> whereto the fire <S%H784><s%> hath consumed <S%H398><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and he shall put <S%H7760><s%> them beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he shall put off <S%H6584><s%> his garments <S%H899><s%>, and put on <S%H3847><s%> other <S%H312><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and carry forth <S%H3318><s%> the ashes <S%H1880><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> unto a clean <S%H2889><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>.

And the fire <S%H784><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be kept burning <S%H3344><s%> thereon <S%H3518><s%>, it shall not go out; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H1197><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> on it every morning <S%H1242><s%>: and he shall lay the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> upon it <S%H6999><s%>, and shall burn thereon the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>.
Fire <S%H784><s%> shall be kept burning <S%H3344><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>; it shall not go out <S%H3518><s%>.

And this is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he shall take <S%H7311><s%> up therefrom his handful <S%H7062><s%>, of the fine flour <S%H5560><s%> of the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and of the oil <S%H8081><s%> thereof <S%H3828><s%>, and all the frankincense which is upon the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>, as the memorial <S%H234><s%> thereof <S%H3068><s%>, unto Jehovah.

And that which is left <S%H3498><s%> thereof shall Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> eat <S%H398><s%>: it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> without leaven <S%H4682><s%> in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>; in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> they shall eat it <S%H398><s%>.

It shall not be baken <S%H644><s%> with leaven <S%H2557><s%>. I have given <S%H5414><s%> it as their portion <S%H2506><s%> of my offerings made by fire <S%H801><s%>; it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>, as the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and as the trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>.

Every male <S%H2145><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it <S%H2706><s%>, as his portion for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>, from the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>: whosoever toucheth <S%H5060><s%> them shall be holy <S%H6942><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

This is the oblation <S%H7133><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, which they shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when he is anointed <S%H4886><s%>: the tenth part <S%H6224><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> perpetually <S%H8548><s%>, half <S%H4276><s%> of it in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and half <S%H4276><s%> thereof in the evening <S%H6153><s%>.

On a baking-pan <S%H4227><s%> it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>; when it is soaked <S%H7246><s%>, thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> it in <S%H7246><s%>: in baken pieces <S%H6595><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H7126><s%> the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the anointed <S%H4899><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> that shall be in his stead from among his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H2706><s%>: by a statute for ever <S%H5769><s%> it shall be wholly <S%H3632><s%> burnt <S%H6999><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And every meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall be wholly burnt <S%H3632><s%>: it shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>: in the place <S%H4725><s%> where the burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%> is killed <S%H7819><s%> shall the sin-offering <S%H5930><s%> be killed <S%H7819><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

The priest <S%H3548><s%> that offereth it for sin <S%H2398><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it <S%H6918><s%>: in a holy place <S%H4725><s%> shall it be eaten <S%H398><s%>, in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

Whatsoever shall touch <S%H5060><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> thereof shall be holy <S%H6942><s%>; and when there is sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof upon any garment <S%H899><s%>, thou shalt wash <S%H3526><s%> that whereon it was sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>.

But the earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> wherein it is boiled <S%H1310><s%> shall be broken <S%H7665><s%>; and if it be boiled <S%H1310><s%> in a brazen <S%H5178><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>, it shall be scoured <S%H4838><s%>, and rinsed <S%H7857><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%>.
Every male <S%H2145><s%> among the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> thereof <S%H6944><s%>: it is most holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And no sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, whereof any of the blood <S%H1818><s%> is brought <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H398><s%>, shall be eaten: it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.
